SELECT * FROM tbl_board_info
WHERE bi_enabled = 1
ORDER BY bi_order
SELECT bi.*, ${limit_value} as limit_value FROM tbl_board_info bi WHERE bi_enabled = 1 ORDER BY bi_order

SELECT b.board_no, b.board_p_no, b.board_group, b.board_order, b.board_depth, b.board_info, b.board_writer, b.board_datetime, b.board_subject, b.board_content, b.board_count, b.board_filename, b.board_delete, b.board_recommend, b.board_category, u.nickname AS board_nickname, bi.bi_name AS board_name, cate.cate_text AS board_cate_text, (SELECT COUNT(c.cmt_no) FROM tbl_comment c WHERE b.board_no = c.cmt_board_no AND c.cmt_delete = 0) AS board_cmt_count FROM tbl_board b LEFT JOIN tbl_board_info bi ON b.board_info = bi.bi_id LEFT JOIN tbl_users u ON b.board_writer = u.username LEFT JOIN tbl_category cate ON b.board_category = cate.cate_id WHERE b.board_info = #{bi_id} AND b.board_delete = 0 ORDER BY b.board_group DESC, b.board_order ASC LIMIT #{limit_value}

SELECT bi.*, p1.page_data_cnt AS data_cnt_board, p1.page_range AS page_range_board, p2.page_data_cnt AS data_cnt_comment, p2.page_range AS page_range_comment FROM tbl_board_info bi LEFT JOIN tbl_pagination p1 ON bi.bi_id = p1.page_bi_id AND p1.page_location = 'board' LEFT JOIN tbl_pagination p2 ON bi.bi_id = p2.page_bi_id AND p2.page_location = 'comment' WHERE bi.bi_id = #{bi_id}
